DOC.brief_summary: The University Washington 's Northwest Research Group Aging partner Area Agencies Aging ( AAA ) Washington Oregon complete translational investigation RDAD ( Reducing Disabilities Alzheimer 's Disease ) . RDAD evidence-based program demonstrate efficacy help old adult dementia maintain physical function remain physically mentally healthy . This study ask two question : 1 ) Can AAA partner successfully translate implement RDAD , 2 ) Is AAA implementation RDAD effective produce desire outcome among agency , provider , old adult dementia family member .
